players.name: Alice
memory: Diana: "I find it strange that Charlie was found dead so suddenly. Let's keep a close eye on each other and make sure we can trust everyone in this town."
Diana: "I'm concerned about the sudden death of Charlie and I think we should all be vigilant to ensure everyone's safety in this town."
